text: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
And the earth was without form
column5: and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep.

text: And God spake all these words
I am the Lord thy God
column5: which have brought thee out of the land of Egypt
column6: out of the house of bondage.

text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Yea
column5: though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death
column6: I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
In all thy ways acknowledge him
column5: and he shall direct thy paths.

text: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run
column5: and not be weary; and they shall walk

text: Seek ye the Lord while he may be found
column5: call ye upon him while he is near:

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
But seek ye first the kingdom of God
column5: and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.

text: In the beginning was the Word
column5: and the Word was with God

text: For God so loved the world
column5: that he gave his only begotten Son
column6: that whosoever believeth in him should not perish

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God
column5: to them who are the called according to his purpose.

text: And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind
column5: that ye may prove what is that good

text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
If any of you lack wisdom
column6: that giveth to all men liberally
column7: and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

text: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death
column7: neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
